summary: Cable from Mexico City regarding Benito Ruiz Gorilo, a former VP of Travel Caribbean Area and Cuban delegate to the ASTA convention in Mexico City. Request for traces and POA. Subject has access to internal and external travel info and claims valuable information stored in the National Post Office. He has also assisted anti-Castro persons by forging visas. He cooperated with the CIA in Havana in 1959 and appears cooperative now.
title: 104-10000-10065 2025 RELEASE UNDER THE PRESIDENT JOHN F. KENNEDY ASSASSINATION RECORDS ACT OF 1992
